_comment: Template for updating consensus parameters. All fields are REQUIRED.
_instructions: 1. Query current params: posd query consensus params --output json
2. Copy this template and update the values you want to change
3. Make sure to include ALL sections (block, evidence, validator, abci)
4. The authority address is the gov module address
title: Update Consensus Parameters
summary: This proposal updates the consensus parameters for the chain.
